job.title: Senior Software Engineer / Software Engineer - Bioinformatics & Lab Informatics
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtDescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtArzeda is a worldleader in protein design and synthetic biology Leveraging our core expertise in structurebased computational protein design machine learning and highthroughput testing we design novel proteins and biocatalytic processes for the sustainable production of performance ingredients and materials A deep tech missiondriven company we are passionate about our mission to design novel proteins and products that enhance our lives and protect our planetltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtArzeda is searching for a talented software engineer to help build the largest and most comprehensive set of enzyme ampamp protein engineering data the world has seen This is an opportunity to solve a rich and diverse set of problems crucial to the execution and tracking of the highthroughput laboratory experiments necessary to generate that dataset You will work with a multidisciplinary team and play a leading role in crafting the breadth of software tools necessary to enable streamlined workflows across all experimental activities at Arzeda including genetic design assay development ampamp testing analytical chemistry and strain engineeringltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThe preferred work location for this position is Seattle Washington However remote work from other US locations is a possibility The position comes with a competitive salary and benefits including health insurance dental insurance and paid time off commensurate with applicant qualificationsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDeveloping software tools workflows and user interfaces for scientists executing highthroughput laboratory experiments such as NGS and highthroughput enzyme assaysltligtltligtDeveloping extensions for our LIMS and interfacing services to the LIMSltligtltligtDeveloping registries and databases of biological materials such as DNA and organismsltligtltligtCollaborating with scientists to produce actionable software specifications and requirementsltligtltligtCommunicating software engineering objectives approaches and outcomes to internal stakeholdersltligtltligtMentoring fellow software engineersltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtFluency in Java andor PythonltligtltligtSoftware development experience including modern software practices such as version control and automated testingltligtltligtExperience developing bioinformatics or laboratory workflows andor biological databasesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtInquiries and ApplicationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtPlease apply here on LinkedIn or send your CV and a cover letter to jobsatarzedacom with the subject line Software Engineer  InformaticsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtArzeda Corp wwwarzedacom is an equal opportunity employer promoting diversity and inclusion in the workspaceltemgtltpgt
